title: List of qt xpms.h images
data:
This is a a **list of the images in [qt\_xpms.h](/wiki/Qt_xpms.h "Qt xpms.h")**, grouped into functional categories.

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 Principal attributes](#Principal_attributes)
- [2 Encumbrance](#Encumbrance)
- [3 Alignment](#Alignment)
- [4 Condition](#Condition)
- [5 Markers](#Markers)

## Principal attributes

| Identifier | Description                                                                                   | Appearance                                             |
| ---------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------ |
| str\_xpm   | Icon displayed over the adventurer's [strength](/wiki/Strength "Strength") score              | [![Str.png](/images/b/bd/Str.png)](/wiki/File:Str.png) |
| dex\_xpm   | Icon displayed above the adventurer's [dexterity](/wiki/Dexterity "Dexterity") score          | [![Dex.png](/images/9/93/Dex.png)](/wiki/File:Dex.png) |
| cns\_xpm   | Icon displayed above the adventurer's [constitution](/wiki/Constitution "Constitution") score | [![Cns.png](/images/b/ba/Cns.png)](/wiki/File:Cns.png) |
| int\_xpm   | Icon displayed above the adventurer's [intelligence](/wiki/Intelligence "Intelligence") score | [![Int.png](/images/c/c9/Int.png)](/wiki/File:Int.png) |
| wis\_xpm   | Icon displayed above the adventurer's [wisdom](/wiki/Wisdom "Wisdom") score                   | [![Wis.png](/images/e/e2/Wis.png)](/wiki/File:Wis.png) |
| cha\_xpm   | Icon displayed above the adventurer's [charisma](/wiki/Charisma "Charisma") score             | [![Cha.png](/images/9/9b/Cha.png)](/wiki/File:Cha.png) |

## Encumbrance

| Identifier    | Description                                                                         | Appearance                                                         |
| ------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| slt\_enc\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [burdened](/wiki/Encumbrance "Encumbrance")   | [![Slt enc.png](/images/5/50/Slt_enc.png)](/wiki/File:Slt_enc.png) |
| mod\_enc\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [stressed](/wiki/Encumbrance "Encumbrance")   | [![Mod enc.png](/images/d/d4/Mod_enc.png)](/wiki/File:Mod_enc.png) |
| hvy\_enc\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [strained](/wiki/Encumbrance "Encumbrance")   | [![Hvy enc.png](/images/0/03/Hvy_enc.png)](/wiki/File:Hvy_enc.png) |
| ext\_enc\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [overtaxed](/wiki/Encumbrance "Encumbrance")  | [![Ext enc.png](/images/0/0e/Ext_enc.png)](/wiki/File:Ext_enc.png) |
| ovr\_enc\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [overloaded](/wiki/Encumbrance "Encumbrance") | [![Ovr enc.png](/images/6/60/Ovr_enc.png)](/wiki/File:Ovr_enc.png) |

## Alignment

| Identifier   | Description                                                                          | Appearance                                                         |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| lawful\_xpm  | Icon displayed to show that the adventurer is [lawful](/wiki/Alignment "Alignment")  | [![Lawful.png](/images/1/10/Lawful.png)](/wiki/File:Lawful.png)    |
| neutral\_xpm | Icon displayed to show that the adventurer is [neutral](/wiki/Alignment "Alignment") | [![Neutral.png](/images/b/b3/Neutral.png)](/wiki/File:Neutral.png) |
| chaotic\_xpm | Icon displayed to show the adventurer is [chaotic](/wiki/Alignment "Alignment")      | [![Chaotic.png](/images/4/46/Chaotic.png)](/wiki/File:Chaotic.png) |

## Condition

| Identifier    | Description                                                                                | Appearance                                                            |
| ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| hungry\_xpm   | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [hungry](/wiki/Hunger "Hunger")                      | [![Hungry.png](/images/a/a6/Hungry.png)](/wiki/File:Hungry.png)       |
| satiated\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [satiated](/wiki/Hunger "Hunger")                    | [![Satiated.png](/images/f/f4/Satiated.png)](/wiki/File:Satiated.png) |
| blind\_xpm    | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [blind](/wiki/Blindness "Blindness")                 | [![Blind.png](/images/6/68/Blind.png)](/wiki/File:Blind.png)          |
| confused\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [confused](/wiki/Confusion "Confusion")              | [![Confused.png](/images/6/68/Confused.png)](/wiki/File:Confused.png) |
| stunned\_xpm  | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [stunned](/wiki/Stunned "Stunned")                   | [![Stunned.png](/images/1/1c/Stunned.png)](/wiki/File:Stunned.png)    |
| hallu\_xpm    | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [hallucinating](/wiki/Hallucination "Hallucination") | [![Hallu.png](/images/f/fb/Hallu.png)](/wiki/File:Hallu.png)          |
| sick\_fp\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer suffers from [food poisoning](/wiki/Disease "Disease")  | [![Sick fp.png](/images/f/f2/Sick_fp.png)](/wiki/File:Sick_fp.png)    |
| sick\_il\_xpm | Icon displayed when the adventurer is [ill](/wiki/Disease "Disease") from a monster attack | [![Sick il.png](/images/e/e1/Sick_il.png)](/wiki/File:Sick_il.png)    |

## Markers

| Identifier            | Description                                                                                                                                                     | Appearance                                                                              |
| --------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| pet\_mark\_xpm        | Image combined with a large monster [tile](/wiki/Tile "Tile") to mark the monster as a [pet](/wiki/Pet "Pet")                                                   | [![Pet mark.png](/images/8/8a/Pet_mark.png)](/wiki/File:Pet_mark.png)                   |
| pet\_mark\_small\_xpm | Image combined with a small monster [tile](/wiki/Tile "Tile") to mark the monster as a [pet](/wiki/Pet "Pet")                                                   | [![Pet mark small.png](/images/7/76/Pet_mark_small.png)](/wiki/File:Pet_mark_small.png) |
| pile\_mark\_xpm       | Image combined with an object [tile](/wiki/Tile "Tile") to mark the presence of other objects (*added in [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1")*) | [![Pile mark.png](/images/d/dd/Pile_mark.png)](/wiki/File:Pile_mark.png)                |

[![This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.](/images/d/d3/Nh361-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "This article has been updated to reflect NetHack 3.6.1. Click here for more information.")

**This page may need to be updated for the [current version](/wiki/Current_version "Current version") of *NetHack*.**

It may contain text specific to [NetHack 3.6.1](/wiki/NetHack_3.6.1 "NetHack 3.6.1"). Information on this page may be out of date.

**Editors:** After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
html:
List of qt xpms.h images

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

This is a a list of the images in qt_xpms.h, grouped into functional categories.

Contents

  • 1 Principal attributes
  • 2 Encumbrance
  • 3 Alignment
  • 4 Condition
  • 5 Markers

Principal attributes

Identifier Description Appearance
str_xpm Icon displayed over the adventurer's strength score
dex_xpm Icon displayed above the adventurer's dexterity score
cns_xpm Icon displayed above the adventurer's constitution score
int_xpm Icon displayed above the adventurer's intelligence score
wis_xpm Icon displayed above the adventurer's wisdom score
cha_xpm Icon displayed above the adventurer's charisma score

Encumbrance

Identifier Description Appearance
slt_enc_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is burdened
mod_enc_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is stressed
hvy_enc_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is strained
ext_enc_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is overtaxed
ovr_enc_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is overloaded

Alignment

Identifier Description Appearance
lawful_xpm Icon displayed to show that the adventurer is lawful
neutral_xpm Icon displayed to show that the adventurer is neutral
chaotic_xpm Icon displayed to show the adventurer is chaotic

Condition

Identifier Description Appearance
hungry_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is hungry
satiated_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is satiated
blind_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is blind
confused_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is confused
stunned_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is stunned
hallu_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is hallucinating
sick_fp_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer suffers from food poisoning
sick_il_xpm Icon displayed when the adventurer is ill from a monster attack

Markers

Identifier Description Appearance
pet_mark_xpm Image combined with a large monster tile to mark the monster as a pet
pet_mark_small_xpm Image combined with a small monster tile to mark the monster as a pet
pile_mark_xpm Image combined with an object tile to mark the presence of other objects (added in NetHack 3.6.1)

This page may need to be updated for the current version of NetHack.

It may contain text specific to NetHack 3.6.1. Information on this page may be out of date.

Editors: After reviewing this page and making necessary edits, please change the {{nethack-361}} tag to the current version's tag or {{noversion}} as appropriate.
